hero_text: Integrate Stayopia Hospitality Approach into your business. We will help you to increase comfort and reduce expenses via modern hospitality trends.
what_are_we_doing_text: At PlusPrograms we developed a new approach to Hospitality. We believe that the mission of your business is to provide guests with all tools for flawless integration with your business, city and surroundings. Guide your guests with Stayopia mobile products for the mutual benefit.
video_text: It Is All Together In One Product

services.text_one: Our business started to sell more with Stayopia, to our surprise, many customers use it for making orders in and out the hotel. We become the first business to use this technology in !!! Place, and we recommended it to our friends.
services.text_two: My business used the technology like Stayopia, but it was only for our restaurant and price was higher. With Stayopia we started to work easier with the customers from abroad, especially from China. Employees are happy too, because the range of communication was redirected online. As an additional benefit, we were able to help small local businesses by recommending our customers what and how to try in !!! Name of the place.
services.text_three: We could not renovate the !!! Name of the hotel !!! for many years. By installing Stayopia technology we felt a difference in the level of customer satisfaction. Cheap online solution allowed us to save money on the hotel itself and motivated employees and customers. Thank you, Stayopia!

about.title_one: Onboard your team and decorate your profile
about.title_three: Integrate businesses around and earn commission.
about.title_four: Communicate with your international customers conveniently
